data.title: â€‹Donnie Wahlberg and Jenny McCarthy are married
data.meta_description: Get the details on the couple's big day
data.text:
Donnie Wahlberg and Jenny McCarthy are officially husband and wife.

The couple tied the knot Sunday in a ceremony outside Chicago, McCarthy's publicist, Brad Cafarelli, confirmed.

According to People, McCarthy donned a gown she bought at Berdorf Goodman.

The pair started dating last year and announced their engagement in April.

It's the second marriage for both 45-year-old Wahlberg and 41-year-old McCarthy.

Wahlberg was married to Kim Fey from 1999-2008. They have two children together. McCarthy was married to director John Asher from 1995-2005. They have a son named Evan. McCarthy dated Jim Carrey after her divorce.

Wahlberg stars in the CBS police drama "Blue Bloods" and also appears in an A&E reality show about a family restaurant called Wahlburgers that's run by his brother Paul.

Wahlberg still performs with his boy band New Kids on the Block.
